text: Angustura is a town in the municipality of Além Paraíba in the Zona da Mata region of Minas Gerais state, Brazil. It lies about north of Além Paraíba and is the seat of a district of that city of the same name. ==External links== *History of Angustura *Geody Category:Neighbourhoods in Minas Gerais
title: Angustura
